Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Membership \Mem"ber*ship\, n. 1. The state of being a member. [1913 Webster]
2. The collective body of members, as of a society. [1913 Webster]

membership n 1: the body of members of an organization or group; "they polled their membership"; "they found dissension in their own ranks"; "he joined the ranks of the unemployed" [syn: {rank}] 2: the state of being a member
